views.markdown:
Version 1.3.7 - Added the option to Enable Switcher Square Cards. Version 1.3.6
- Added the option to Enable Switcher Rounded Cards.
- Added the option to Enable Splash Screen Cards.
- Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels.
- Small Changes in Prefs.
Version 1.3.5
- Added the option to Enable Switcher Minimized Preview Cards (idea given by prouser).
Version 1.3.4
- Added the options to Enable Switcher Tiny and Small Sizes (tip by sinfool).
Version 1.3.3
- Added the option to Disable App Suggestions In Switcher (tip by sinfool).
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Descriptions in Prefs.
Version 1.3.2
- Now the Blur options in Preferences are shown all in Switch Cells.
- Other Small Changes in the Preferences Panel.
- Some Code Improvements and Fixes.
Version 1.3.1
- Added the option to Open the Switcher Centered on the Current Application (thanks sinfool for his Patch).
- Small Change in the Preferences Panel.


Version 1.3
- Added the Full Support for iOS 10 (thanks a lot my dear Friend Olivier Crespo for the nice Help) .
- Added the option to Open the Switcher Centered on the HomeScreen (thanks sinfool for his Patch).
- Now it is not more needed the Respring in order to apply the Changes.
- Improvements and Changes in the Preferences Panel (better Settings).
Version 0.0.1-27
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
Version 0.0.1-26
- Added the option to Disable the Layout Subviews of the Cards.
Version 0.0.1-24
- Added the option to enable the Default Blur Effect View on the Switcher Background.
- Added the option in Extras Section to enable the Switcher List Style (thanks @ca13ra1).
- Added the option in Extras Section to enable the HomeScreen Card Transparent.
- Added the option in Extras Section to disable the Icons of the Cards in the Switcher.
- Added the option in Extras Section to disable the Icons and the Labels of the Cards in the Switcher.
Version 0.0.1-12
- Added the credits @sinfool (by Flex Community). Sorry if i didn't do before.
